articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Flight Drills of Unit 1017 of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Flight Drills of Unit 1017 of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), together with Ri Sol Ju visited Unit 1017 of KPA Air and Anti-Air Force honored with the Title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment to guide flight drills. 
					 Kim Jong Un mounted the command post, received a report on the flight drill program and guided the drills. 
					
					 Watching successful diverse militant actions of airmen including take-off and landing and air combat, he said they were very good in training. He praised them for having acquired high flying skills as intended by the party. 
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction, noting that the airmen of the unit are fully ready to make sorties any moment. 
					
					 "I always think of the air routes covered by the pilots to reliably defend the sky of the country", he said, asking commanding officers to convey his feelings to them.
					
					 He gave an instruction to further intensify the flight training in the future to fully prepare the pilots as death-defying corps and able combat pilots capable of skillfully fighting a modern war. 
					
					 He went round the newly built place for combat duty and the airshed visited by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Going round the monument to the field guidance provided by Kim Jong Il standing at the command of the unit, he instructed the unit to preserve well the photos of Kim Jong Il and take good care of the monument so as to let airmen and other service personnel always bear his undying feats deep in mind.
					
					 He stressed the need for the pilots of the unit to make good preparations for the military parade for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the service personnel of the unit would put bigger spurs to rounding off the combat preparations and thus defend the sky of the socialist country as firm as an iron wall.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Yun Tong Hyon and Hong Yong Chil.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to January 18 General Machinery Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to January 18 General Machinery Plant
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the January 18 General Machinery Plant.
					 He went round the room devoted to the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 Looking with keen attention at significant historic data and relics, he said that President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il attached great importance to the plant as it is playing an important role in the development of the nation's machine-building industry. He added that he always pays great attention to the production at the plant.
					
					 After being told that the construction of the above-said room was not completed even in over two years, he said he learned about what was the main reason for the plant's failure to put production on a normal footing.
					
					 The party has stressed that it is important to keep the ideological education ahead of production for raising the enthusiasm of the producer masses, he noted, strongly criticizing the party committee of the plant for failing to accept the party's policy ideologically.
					
					 "I don't know what officials of the provincial party committee see at the plant and what they are guiding," he noted, warning them of their businessmen-like hackneyed way of thinking and work style.
					
					  At the construction site of the room for the education in the revolutionary history he watched for a long while piles of gravels and sand and blocks here and there. "I can't find proper words to express that mess," he added.
					
					 After going round the Hall for Studying Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, he noted that the provincial party committee should draw a serious lesson as regards the implementation of the party's policy on giving priority to the political and ideological education.
					
					 Examining varieties of machines produced by the plant, he learned about the fulfillment of its plan.
					
					 He went round the general assembling shop, processing shop, test shop, casting shop and various other places of the plant to learn about its technological updating. 
					
					  He seriously noted that production equipment of the plant are outdated in view of the requirements of the age of the knowledge-based economy and it is behind other industrial establishments in cultured practices in production and life.
					
					 Learning in detail about the supply service, he felt heart-broken when he learned officials of the plant failed to take good care of the living of the employees as desired by the party. 
					
					 Setting forth tasks before the plant, he said:
					
					 "The plant should glorify the leadership exploits o the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 "It should dynamically conduct the ideological education to give fullest play to the mental power of the workers.
					
					 "It should steadily push forward the work for putting the production processes on a modern and scientific basis.
					
					 "The plant should launch a dynamic campaign to improve the supply service, working people's material and cultural standards and establish cultured practices in production and life.
					
					 "The plant is faced with difficult and huge tasks, but it can surely implement them as it has revolutionary workers, the technical staff steeled in practice and a wealth of experience and proud tradition." 
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the workers of the plant would radically remodel it as required by the new century and bring about a great leap forward in the production of modern machines and successfully perform the role as vanguard and shock brigade in carrying out the economic policy of the party.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, Hong Yong Chil, Yun Tong Hyon and Han Song Ho.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture Tuesday to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Kim Jong Il started his work at the Central Committee on June 19, Juche 53 (1964), reflecting the noble intention of President Kim Il Sung and the desire of all the service personnel and the people.
					
					 He led the WPK along the road of victory with his extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom, outstanding leadership ability and noble popular personality, performing immortal feats before the era and the revolution, the country and its people.
					
					 He formulated the President's revolutionary idea as Kimilsungism and proclaimed the modeling the whole of society on the Juche idea as the supreme programme of the WPK. Then he set forth the line of building the party which called for modeling the entire party on Kimilsungism.
					
					 He formulated the Songun politics as the revolutionary leadership mode of the party and developed the WPK into staff of the Songun revolution.
					
					 He demonstrated the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's Korea before the whole world and ushered in a new history of building a thriving socialist nation on this land.
					
					 He clearly oriented the party building and activities to implementing the Songun revolutionary line to bolster up the country's defence capability in every way.
					
					 Thanks to his energetic leadership the DPRK could demonstrate its might as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and usher in a new heyday in building socialist culture.
					
					 A new turning phase of the movement for the country's reunification was opened and its international prestige and influence further increased and the international solidarity with the Korean revolution grew stronger remarkably.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, made a report at the meeting. 
					
					 The portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il and his immortal feats will always be remembered by our party members and other people and world progressives to shine forever, he said, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's Juche-oriented idea and cause of party building are being successfully carried forward and developed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Victory and glory are always set in store for the Korean revolution which is dynamically advancing, flying high the party flag of Juche under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the meeting were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, and other senior officials of the party, the state and the army, officials in various fields, persons of merit and Pyongyangites.

articles.title: Congratulations to Iranian President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Iranian President
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Hassan Rouhani upon his election as president of Iran.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries which have favorably developed day by day since the victory in the  Islamic revolution in Iran would grow stronger in various fields including politics, economy and culture in the future.
					
					 He wished the president great success in his responsible work to defend the gains of the Islamic revolution and achieve the independent development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Kye Gwan Leaves for China
articles.content:
Kim Kye Gwan Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Kye Gwan, first vice-minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and his party left here Tuesday to visit China.

articles.title: KPA Delegation Back Home from Vietnam
articles.content:
KPA Delegation Back Home from Vietnam
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The delegation of officials in charge of foreign affairs of the Korean People's Army led by Major General An Yong Gi came back home Tuesday after visiting Vietnam.

articles.title: More Rallies Held
articles.content:
More Rallies Held
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Rallies took place in South Phyongan, South Hwanghae and Kangwon provinces and Rason City on June 17 and 18 to vow to devotedly carry out the important tasks laid down in the historic appeal of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un and to heartily respond to the letter sent to the people across the country by those reclaiming the Sepho tableland.
					 Present at the meetings were leading officials of party and power organs and working people's organizations, officials and other people of industrial establishments and co-op farms as well as teachers and students of universities and collages in the localities.
					
					 The appeal was conveyed at the rallies.
					
					 Then the letter was read out.
					
					 The speakers at the meetings said that the historic appeal reflects the matchless pluck and spirit of the brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu determined to build the country into the most powerful state in the world and a land of bliss for the people as early as possible.
					
					 They noted that it also reflects the great trust in the army and people who are ready to turn out as one in hearty response to any calls of the party.
					
					 They called for keeping the modern light industrial factories and local industrial factories, which were built by indigenous efforts and technology, in full-capacity operation to make a tangible contribution to the improvement of the standard of people's living, bearing in mind Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 They also called for greeting with shining labor feats the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War by learning from the spirit of the soldier-builders creating the "Masikryong Speed".

articles.title: Information Workers of Primary Trade Union Organizations Tour Mt. Paektu Area
articles.content:
Information Workers of Primary Trade Union Organizations Tour Mt. Paektu Area
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Information workers of primary trade union organizations across the country toured revolutionary battle sites and revolutionary sites in Mt. Paektu area from June 12 to 18 to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 During their march, they laid floral baskets and flowers before the statutes of President Kim Il Sung at the Monument to Victorious Battle of Pochonbo, Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, shore of Lake Samji and the Chongbong Bivouac Ground and the mosaic depicting the three commanders of Mt. Paektu at its secret camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					 In Pochonbo they looked round the then Command Post of the Pochonbo Battle, police post of the Japanese imperialists, sub-county office and other places.
					
					 After being briefed on the Samjiyon Grand Monument, they went round groups of sculptures and visited the Samjiyon Revolutionary Museum.
					
					 They commanded a bird's eye-view of the majestic Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu and its forest, recollecting with deep emotion the great revolutionary history and undying feats of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 After visiting the Paektusan secret camp, they held an oath-taking meeting before Kim Jong Il's old home in the Paektusan secret camp.
					
					 At the end of the meeting they looked round with keen interest the historic relics preserved with good care at the old home.
					
					 They marched toward the Chongbong Bivouac Ground, the Konchang Bivouac Ground and the Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, holding anti-Japanese guerilla-style information and agitation contest, question-and-answer study contest, sports games and other political and cultural events.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at WPK Central Committee
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen met at Chongjin Port on Tuesday to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The participants laid bouquets before a large mosaic portraying smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in Chongjin City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present there were the captain and crewmen of Panamanian-flagged ships.
					
					 At the meeting speakers said that Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung and developed the WPK into an invincible party and glorious party of Kim Il Sung leading the revolution and construction to victory, enjoying absolute support and trust of the popular masses.
					
					 The WPK is ushering in a new heyday as it is having the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the head of the party, state and army, they noted.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is glorifying the undying feats the peerlessly great men performed in party building, they stated.
					
					 They wished the Korean people bigger successes in building a thriving nation, remaining loyal to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to him was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Taedonggang Building-materials Factory
articles.content:
Taedonggang Building-materials Factory
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Taedonggang Building-materials Factory in the DPRK mass-produces various kinds of quality building parts.
					 Among its products are small-sized hollow blocks higher in resistance and better in heat insulation than others.
					
					 Circular and rectangular pipes of various sizes are very effective for water pipe, heating pipe, scaffolding, balustrade and other materials of structures.
					
					 Varieties of pavements, including street bricks, are also produced at the factory.
					
					 Besides, the factory produces plastic window frames, roofing tiles, expanded plastics, C-shaped steel, etc.
					
					 Pak Yong Nam, chief engineer of the Junggu Public Building Construction Company, told KCNA that the factory's products make it possible to raise both the quality and speed of construction.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for National Unity
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for National Unity
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- National reunification is a vital issue related to the destiny of the nation and national unity is a top priority task for achieving it, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article. 
					 National reunification presents itself as the most urgent issue now and a broad spectrum of people in the north and the south should not regard their own isms and interests as absolute, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 All the political parties and organizations in the north and the south should not prioritize their own isms, interests and policies but boldly pool efforts for national reunification, common interests to the nation. Cooperation and exchange should be orientated to solving essential problems for achieving nation's common interests. 
					
					 The talks between the authorities of the north and the south that were arranged with much effort proved abortive because the south Korean authorities did not take the stand of serving the interests of the nation. The south Korean authorities should not hamper the efforts for the improvement of the north-south relations while minding needless things, but opt for reconciliation and reunification. 
					
					 All the Koreans must value the idea of "By our nation itself" and positively work for unity and cooperation based on it. 
					
					 Infinite and tremendous is the united national strength and nothing can hold back the nationwide push for the creation of a new history of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: "Saenuri Party's" Drumbeat for "Striking Base" under Fire
articles.content:
"Saenuri Party's" Drumbeat for "Striking Base" under Fire
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- It was recently reported that during an "interpellation at the puppet National Assembly" (NA) political charlatans of the south Korean "Saenuri Party" let loose a whole string of outbursts calling for "striking the base" of the supreme leadership of the DPRK in case of the "outbreak of all-out war."
					 Minju Joson on Tuesday in a bylined commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 These remarks were deliberate provocative outpourings extremely rattling the nerves of the servicepersons and people of the DPRK and unpardonable behaviors going against the wishes of the people for the improved inter-Korean relations and national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 By openly making this declaration of war before the inter-Korean talks between authorities of the north and the south the puppet regime fully revealed that it is not interested in those talks.
					
					 When war-like forces in the NA cried out for "striking the base" of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the south Korean puppet prime minister fanned up the atmosphere of confrontation with the north by making such provocative remarks against it as "continued provocations", "dismantlement of nukes " and "measures  against the provocation of the north."
					
					 Such provocative remarks and the breakdown of the talks made it clear that "confidence-building process" touted by the present ruling quarters is little short of the watchwords "no nukes, opening and 3 000 dollars" put up by traitor Lee Myung Bak as his "policy toward the north", and it is a craftier policy of confrontation.
					
					 If the south Korean regime truly wants the improved inter-Korean ties, it should make an apology for such reckless remarks and make assurances against their recurrence.

articles.title: Human Rights Abuse Scandal in U.S. Decried
articles.content:
Human Rights Abuse Scandal in U.S. Decried
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Guardian, The Washington Post and other world media disclosed that the U.S. National Security Agency accessed international internet servers and systematically wiretapped phone calls, photos, e-mails and other private information of people. Not only Americans but foreigners have reportedly been subject to the espionage that has been applied indiscriminately by the U.S. intelligence institution.
					 A bylined commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday says this clearly proves once again that the U.S. is a kingpin of human rights abuses as it put the world under its watch network and has conducted espionage against mankind.
					
					 The U.S. has been intent on collecting information of individuals, an indication of serious problem in its morality and concept on human rights, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 Each individual is entitled to live and develop with dignity as a social being.
					
					 But in American society where the jungle law prevails, only the strong men's rights over the weak men are recognized.
					
					 The overwhelming majority of the toiling masses are denied the dignity and rights as human beings in American society where only the rights of the rich are recognized and advocated.
					
					 As the recent human rights abuse scandal broke out, high-ranking officials of the U.S. intelligence agency spoke loudly of its necessity for the "prevention of terrorism". But this is just a lame excuse to cover up its crime.
					
					 The U.S. had better reflect on its poor plight facing international human rights trial before making mention of such sacred words of human rights.

articles.title: Meeting Held in S. Korea to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration
articles.content:
Meeting Held in S. Korea to Mark Anniversary of June 15 Joint Declaration 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and social organizations of south Korea including the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration, opposition party figures and more than 1 000 people from all walks of life held a meeting before Rimjin Pavilion in Phaju, Kyonggi Province on June 15, the 13th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Ri Chang Bok, permanent representative of the committee, made an address.
					
					 He deplored that the talks between authorities of the south and the north of Korea proved abortive and the June 15 national joint events failed to take place.
					
					 Non-governmental reunification movement plays an important role in developing the inter-Korean relations, he said, adding that only when the people of different social standings become main players in the reunification movement, is it possible to revive the June 15 era and pave a way for reunification and peace.
					
					 Though the June 15 national joint events failed to take place, the day of the publication of the July 4 joint statement should be celebrated as an event common to the nation without fail, he noted, adding:
					
					 The committee will play its role for peace and reunification.
					
					 Then, the floor was taken by opposition party figures.
					
					 An appeal to all the Koreans at home and abroad adopted by the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration was read out at the meeting.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants staged a demonstration from Rimjin Pavilion to Thongil Bridge.

articles.title: UN Official Criticizes "Security Law" of S. Korea
articles.content:
UN Official Criticizes "Security Law" of S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Margaret, UN secretary-general's special representative for human rights champions, criticized the "Security Law" of south Korea. 
					 At a press conference on June 7 during her south Korea visit Margaret said that the "Security Law" seriously abuses human rights. 
					
					 The law brands the call for legitimate rights of social activists as "anti-state" one and "threat to public order" and bans south Koreans from meeting people in the DPRK, Margaret charged.

articles.title: Director of Editorial Board of S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Sentenced to Prison Term
articles.content:
Director of Editorial Board of S. Headquarters of Pomminryon Sentenced to Prison Term 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Seoul High Court on June 13 sentenced Choe Tong Jin, director of the editorial board of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), to two years in jail and two year suspension of qualification on charges of the violation of the fascist "Security Law".
					 The fascist authorities took this action on charges of contempt of court and violation of the above-said law for the mere reason that he protested against the unreasonable verdict given to members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.
					
					 The headquarters at an emergency press conference declared the court's ruling as unreasonable.

articles.title: Correct Education in Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Correct Education in Reunification Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) --  The Kwangju City Education Agency of south Korea through its website on June 13 called upon all schools in Kwangju area to conduct education in reunification.
					 It expressed regret at the abortion of the talks at which authorities of the south and the north can sit together and discuss the principle and ways of achieving reunification.
					
					 Hoping that the south-north dialogue would be conducted without precondition, though belatedly,  it held that education in reunification should be conducted without fail to help students in Kwangju have correct understanding of history on major anniversaries and days such as the adoption of the June 15 joint declaration, May 18 Kwangju uprising and June 10 resistance.

articles.title: More Persons Killed by Tick in S. Korea
articles.content:
More Persons Killed by Tick in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Another person was killed by tick in the eastern coastal area of south Korea, according to south Korean CBS.
					 An old man died on June 15 after suffering from the symptom of virus infection by tick since the end of May.

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Media Slammed for Releasing Anti-Reunification Misinformation
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Media Slammed for Releasing Anti-Reunification Misinformation 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Ri Jong Hui, representative of the Unified Progressive Party, an opposition party of south Korea, on June 13 condemned ultra-rightist conservative media for releasing  misinformation.
					 In the past the south-north ministerial talks were held without argument about "rank" of the head of the delegation, the representative said, and went on:
					
					 Those concerned who participated in dialogues with the north and experts claim that it is not necessary to stick to "rank" as machinery and systems in the south and the north differ from each other, adding that it is regrettable that the present regime of south Korea blocked the possibility of dialogue with the north, arguing about "rank."
					
					 The representative charged that conservative media's confrontational and provocative activities are further bedeviling the south-north relations and fomenting distrust among the people.
					
					 The representative accused conservative media of releasing such misinformation  as "there is concern about hostage taking", straining the situation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone and putting enterprises in a crisis and passing the buck for the abortion of the talks between authorities of the south and the north to the north.
					
					 Intolerable are the anti-reunification acts of the conservative media contrary to the future of the nation, the representative added.

articles.title: Actions Staged against IS Interference in Election in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions Staged against IS Interference in Election in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The actions against the puppet Intelligence Service's illegal interference in the election were staged in Seoul on June 15, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 As known, the IS labeled the progressive forces "the forces following the north" and put pressure upon those organizations and persons opposed to the project for improving the four large rivers, the moves to conclude the FTA with the U.S., etc. in every way, while perpetrating political investigation into them in a bid to turn the situation favorable for the conservative forces during the "presidential" election last year.
					
					 An organization demanding the resignation of the present chief executive held a candlelight meeting before Posin Temple, declaring invalid the "presidential" election which allowed interference not only by police but by the IS.
					
					 The citizens meeting for probing the truth behind the fraudulent election held a rally around Kwanghwamun at which it demanded an investigation for thoroughly probing the truth behind the IS's interference in the election and punishment of those concerned.

articles.title: Action for Wage Hike Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Action for Wage Hike Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally in Seoul on June 13 in demand of wage hike.
					 At the rally speakers accused the General Association of Managers of recently turning down the demand of the workers for wage hike under the pretext of business slump.
					
					 They held that no matter how hard workers work, they get just a petty amount of money with which they can hardly eke out their living.
					
					 Though the regime changed, there goes on the policy of suppressing and exploiting workers and making big businessmen corpulent, they deplored.
					
					 They condemned the regime for trying to turn even railways, gas, electricity and other public sectors into a means for increasing the profits of big businessmen.
					
					 In order to topple the regime, it is necessary for the workers to get united in action, they said, declaring the Confederation of Trade Unions would take the lead in the action for wage hike.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Italian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Italian Organization
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- The Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association posted "Literature Is Humanics" from General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Theory of Cinematic Art" on an internet magazine on May 21.
					 The work, published on April 11, Juche 62 (1973), clarifies the nature of literature and arts, the essence and fundamental requirements of communist humanics, etc.
					
					 Also posted on the magazine was a photo of Kim Jong Il providing field guidance to the work in the field of film industry.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Work at C.C., WPK Observed Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place in Peru and a lecture in Sweden on June 11 to mark the 49th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The president of the Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and other speakers said Kim Jong Il was the great leader who developed the WPK into the one which organizes and guides all victories of the Korean people. The exploits he performed in the party building will be ever-lasting, they added. 
					
					 The chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in his lecture titled "Eternal general secretary of WPK" said:
					
					 The theory of Songun politics General Secretary Kim Jong Il formulated in a unique way serves as an invincible banner for protecting the sovereignty of the country and the nation and upholding the independence of the popular masses under the situation where the imperialists' policy of strength has become ever more undisguised.
					
					 He wisely led socialist construction of the Korean people, bringing about an epoch-making change noteworthy in history. 
					
					 The DPRK is now demonstrating its dignity and might as a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state thanks to his wise leadership. 
					
					 The distinguished exploits he performed by leading the WPK for decades serve as a permanent engine powerfully encouraging the Korean people in their socialist cause.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Library Opens in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Library Opens in Nigeria 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Library opened with due ceremony in Enugu State of Nigeria on June 11. 
					 Displayed in the library are photos on the exploits performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 There are also on display works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and publications introducing the struggle of the Korean people. 
					
					 Present at the inaugural ceremony were personages of the Enugu State government, Nigeria-Korea Stereo Industrial Company and a printing house and masses. 
					
					 The chief of the library who is the managing director of the Nigeria-Korea Stereo Industrial Company said in his speech that Kim Jong Il steadily developed the Juche idea in depth through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities. 
					
					 The director of the commerce and industry department of the Enugu State Government, the director of the printing house and other speakers said that the opening of the library was an expression of the Nigerian people's deep reverence for Kim Jong Il, who made an undying contribution to the human cause of independence. 
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the inaugural ceremony.

articles.title: Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Korean People's Victory in War to Be Celebrated in Russia 
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War was inaugurated at the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia on June 10. 
					 Victor Yegorov, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee set the celebration period from June 10 to July 28 and decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to widely introduce the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by bringing about a victory in the war.

articles.title: Italian Magazine Introduces Pyongyang Int'l Football School
articles.content:
Italian Magazine Introduces Pyongyang Int'l Football School
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- An article titled "Pyongyang International Football School" was posted on an Italian internet magazine on June 5. 
					 It gave a detailed account of the fact that the school was built in the DPRK thanks to the firm will of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un to train schoolchildren with aptitude for football as world-level footballers.
					
					 Introducing successes achieved by players of the DPRK in international games, it said that the Masik Pass Skiing Ground and many other sports facilities have been built and remodeled for the development of sports and the promotion of people's health.

articles.title: Nepali Papers Term U.S. Provoker of Korean War
articles.content:
Nepali Papers Term U.S. Provoker of Korean War
 Pyongyang, June 18 (KCNA) -- Nepali newspapers carried articles branding the U.S. imperialists as a provocateur of the Korean War on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 Rahasha on June 13 said in an article title "Why did the U.S. ignite Korean War":
					
					 On June 25, 1950, the U.S. instigated the south Korean puppet army to start an all-out invasion of the DPRK, sparking the Korean War, the fiercest since the end of the Second World War. 
					
					 The first reason for the U.S. ignition of the Korean War was to carry out its strategy for world domination. 
					
					 The U.S. regarded Korea as a military strategic vantage for advancing into the Asian Continent. Its forces landed in south Korea under the mask of "liberator" in September of 1945 and cooked up a pro-U.S. puppet regime. 
					
					 The U.S. made south Korea totally dependent on it politically, economically and militarily and stepped up its moves for invading the north of Korea in a bid to occupy its whole. 
					
					 The second reason for the U.S. ignition of the war was to tide over its catastrophic economic crisis.
					
					 The decline of the munitions industry after the Second World War increased the joblessness and caused a vicious cycle of overall economy. 
					
					 The reduction of profits of monopolies and other reasons prompted the U.S. to militarize the economy and expand armaments, finally igniting a new war. 
					
					 The third reason for the U.S. ignition of the war was to save the Syngman Rhee fascist puppet regime in south Korea from a tight corner. 
					
					 It was an irrefutable historical fact that by provoking the Korean War the U.S. sought to secure a military strategic vantage for world domination and save the fate of its stooges from a dilemma. 
					
					 The Nepal Today on June 10 fully disclosed the sinister aim sought by the U.S. in igniting the Korean War.

articles.title: Acto central por 49o aniversario de inicio de trabajo de Kim Jong Il en el CC del PTC
articles.content:
Acto central por 49o aniversario de inicio de trabajo de Kim Jong Il en el CC del PTC
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este martes en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 49o aniversario del inicio de trabajo del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					El 19 de junio del 53 (1964) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente comenzo a trabajar en el Comite Central del PTC segun el noble proposito del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el unanime deseo de todos los militares y civiles coreanos. 
					
					Con la extraordinaria perspicacia ideo-teorica, la destacada capacidad directiva y los nobles rasgos populares condujo el PTC por la unica senda de la victoria y realizo imperecederas proezas ante la epoca, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					Formulo la idea revolucionaria del Presidente como kimilsungismo y proclamo la transformacion de toda la sociedad segun el kimilsungismo como el maximo programa del PTC. Y presento la linea en materia de la construccion del partido de transformar todo el partido segun la misma doctrina. 
					
					Definio la politica de Songun como modo de direccion del partido sobre la revolucion e intensifico el PTC como Estado Mayor combativo de la revolucion del Songun. 
					
					Exalto a todo el mundo la dignidad y poderio de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y abrio una nueva historia de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista. 
					
					Consolido por todos los medios la capacidad de defensa nacional concentrando la construccion y las actividades del partido en materializar la linea revolucionaria del Songun. 
					
					Gracias a la energica guia del Dirigente, la RPDC se ha convertido en un pais fabricante y lanzador de satelite artificial, de esta manera se allano una nueva era de prosperidad de la construccion de la cultura socialista. 
					
					Se abrio una nueva coyuntura de viraje en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria, se elevaron el prestigio exterior y la influencia del pais y se fortalecio extraordinariamente la solidaridad internacional con la revolucion coreana. 
					
					El miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Choe Thae Bok, dijo en su informe que la imagen del Dirigente con amplia sonrisa y sus imperecederas proezas seran guardadas para siempre en el alma de los militantes del PTC, el pueblo coreano y la humanidad progresista y brillaran generacion tras generacion. 
					
					La autoctona idea y la causa del Dirigente Kim Jong Il en materia de la construccion del partido se llevan adelante por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, destaco. 
					
					Siempre habra victorias y glorias ante la revolucion coreana que marcha a pasos firmes enarbolando la bandera del Partido bajo la guia del Mariscal, concluyo.
					
					Al acto asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, los funcionarios de diferentes dominios, benemeritos y trabajadores capitalinos.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Hassan Rouhani por su eleccion como presidente irani
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Hassan Rouhani por su eleccion como presidente iran
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam envio el dia 18 un mensaje de felicitacion a Hassan Rouhani quien fue electo como presidente de la Republica Islamica de Iran.
					En la nota el remitente expreso una conviccion de que en el futuro tambien las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises que se desarrollan favorablemente cada dia mas despues de la victoria de la Revolucion Islamica de Iran, se ampliaran aun mas en la politica, la economia, la cultura y otros dominios.
					
					Deseo grandes exitos en las labores responsables del destinatario por defender las conquistas de la Revolucion Islamica y lograr el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais.

Primer vicecanciller de RPDC parte de Pyongyang hacia China

articles.title: Mitines para producir innovaciones en construccion socialista
articles.content:
Mitines para producir innovaciones en construccion socialista
Pyongyang, 18 de junio (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 17 y 18 en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, de Hwanghae del Sur y de Kangwon y la ciudad de Rason los mitines de las masas para materializar las tareas programaticas presentadas en el historico llamamiento del Mariscal Kim Jong Un y responder a la carta de los roturadores de la meseta de Sepho.
					En los actos participaron los funcionarios de las instituciones locales del partido y el poder y las entidades de masas, los funcionarios, trabajadores, profesores, empleados y estudiantes de las fabricas, empresas, granjas cooperativas, universidades y escuelas politecnicas.
					
					En los actos fue transmitido el llamamiento del Mariscal y leida la carta de los participantes en la roturacion de la meseta de Sepho dirigida a los trabajadores de todo el pais.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el historico llamamiento del Mariscal refleja la audacia y el espiritu del genial comandante del monte Paektu para convertir nuestra patria en la potencia y el paraiso del pueblo y la gran confianza en el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que responden a los llamados del partido con toda fidelidad y entusiasmo.
					
					Subrayaron que se deben poner en pleno funcionamiento las fabricas de la industria ligera y la local acondicionadas modernamente con las propias fuerzas y tecnologias guardando profundamente en el corazon el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il para contribuir realmente a la mejora de la condicion de vida del pueblo.
					
					Destacaron que se deben acoger con brillantes exitos laborales el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el 60o aniversario de la victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria aprendiendo el espiritu de lucha de los constructores militares quienes crean la "velocidad Masikryong".
